Title: 8.1.7 Set the Account Lockout Period to At Least 30 Minutes

Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.1.7

==Policy Statement==

Set the account lockout period to at least 30 minutes.

==Policy Purpose==

Locking the terminal after repeated failed authentication attempts ensures that an attacker cannot guess the password in a timely manner.
